alert.note: Alert for Brule; Charles Mix (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 9:24PM MDT until May 29 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Charles Mix County in south central South Dakota... Southeastern Brule County in south central South Dakota... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1023 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles east of Iona, or 17 miles southwest of Kimball, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Charles Mix and southeastern Brule Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central South Dakota.
